import NavComp from '../components/NavComp'; import Collapse from 'react-bootstrap/Collapse'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import RandomMonster1 from '../randomMaster'; import {randomMonsterInfo, randomLandMark, randomTreasure, randomVerb,randomNPCinfo, numberOfMonsters, NumberOfNPC, randomEffect} from "../randomMaster" import RandomResult from "./result" import useRandom from './useRandom'; export default function Encounter() { console.log("how about this: "+randomMonsterInfo) const [level, setLevel ] = useState(1-5) const {verbs,setVerb, landmark,setLandMark,treasure,setTreasure,npc,setNPC, monster,setMonster,numberMonster,setNumberMonster,numberNPC,setNumberNPC,randomLandMarkEffect,setRandomEffect} = useRandom() const clickHandle = event => { event.preventDefault() RandomMonster1(level) setVerb(randomVerb) setLandMark(randomLandMark) setMonster(randomMonsterInfo) setTreasure(randomTreasure) setNPC(randomNPCinfo) setNumberNPC(NumberOfNPC) setNumberMonster(numberOfMonsters) setRandomEffect(randomEffect) console.log("let see if This works: "+ monster) } return ( <>

) }
